schema:description:
The photograph album, covered in red suede and decorated with the initials "SP," was a gift from Josephine Foster to Susan Gilmore Pierce, owner of he Glen Alpine Springs resort. Foster inscribed the album inside cover "Sue dear, with love, Ladye Josephine." 

The album contains images of Glen Alpine Springs resort. Also included are photographs of Susan Gilmore Pierce and Josephine Foster, participating in climbing, fishing, and rowing activities. 

The collection level finding aid is available at the [Online Archive of California](https://oac.cdlib.org/findaid/ark:/13030/c8b56sws).
schema:name: Susan Gilmore Pierce photograph album, circa 1900
schema:publisher: UC Davis Library, Archives and Special Collections
schema:sdPublisher: UC Davis Library, Archives and Special Collections
